text: Brian Alexander Gallant (born April 27, 1982) is a Canadian politician who served as the 33rd Premier of New Brunswick from October 7, 2014, to November 9, 2018. Before, he was Leader of the Opposition. At age 32, he was the second youngest Premier of New Brunswick to assume office. Currently, at age , Gallant is the youngest premier in Canada. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of New Brunswick
title: Brian Gallant
